description:
Snap on these fenders for muddy rides. They fit in the brake mounting holes of your bike, and once installed, you can pop them on and off quickly and easily.

  • Durable steel brakets
  • Compatible with bikes with a seatstay bridge, and a fork with a centred brake mounting hole
  • Compatible with 26in., 27.5in., and 700c wheels
name: SKS Beavertail Fender Set for 26" and 28" Tires
